answer: The bosses of Wilma's gang believe that Anthony Rogers will be useful to them in the current conflict because they feel there is a man more capable than the current boss to lead the Wyoming Gang, and despite his handicap of having had a short time to familiarize himself with their modern ways and facilities, they believe he is the one. The current boss pledges to support Anthony Rogers' leadership at any cost and even passes on his badge of office to him, indicating the approval and support of the Council members.
